resources.string: To start checking OMRs, create an answer key by tapping + at the bottom of your screen

OMR, the multiple choice test scanner app, assess the answer sheets by using your Android device\'s camera. You can get the sheet by emailing us at "opticaltestreader@gmail.com", and you are ready to fill it and check it. It saves your time of manually checking and maintaining the sheets. Great for formative assessments, summative assessments or regular quizzes. It gives teachers the flexibility to scan papers instantly anywhere.
